name: 道格拉斯·哈特里
bio_short: 英国数学家和物理学家。他发展了“自洽场”方法（哈特里法），这是“量子化学”和“计算物理学”的第一个实用计算方法，后被弗拉基米尔·福克（Vladimir Fock）改进为“哈特里-福克方法”。
bio_short_en: A British mathematician and physicist. He developed the 'self-consistent field' method (Hartree method), the first practical computational method for 'quantum chemistry' and 'computational physics', which was later refined by Vladimir Fock into the 'Hartree-Fock method'.
